---
title: "Survival times of prostatic cancer"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
prostatic <- read.csv("prostatic.csv", header = T, sep=",")
attach(prostatic);
head(prostatic)
```

```{r}
index <- order(time)
prostatic <- prostatic[index,]
```


```{r}
len <- length(prostatic[,1])
patient <- seq(1:len)
prostatic <- cbind(prostatic, patient)
```



```{r}
p_score <- 1 - (patient-0.5)/len
prostatic <- cbind(prostatic, p_score)
head(prostatic)
attach(prostatic);

```


```{r}
plot(time,p_score)

```
